name: BellaVadoAvocadoOil

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bella vado
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Are you looking to explore the world of avocado oil? The Founders of Bella Vado California Avocado Oil are excited to share the many uses of avocado oil and its healthy benefits.

Bella Vado California Avocado Oil presents the Bella Vado Alexa Skill! Once you enable the skill: 

- Listen to Daily Tips about the uses of Avocado Oil
- Ask A Question 

Listen to the Daily Tip of the day!
· Learn how to make avocado soup
· How does avocado oil taste?
· Learn how avocado oil can moisturize
· Are avocados fruits or veggies?
· Learn about avocado nutrients 
- How is avocado oil processed?

Sample questions to ask Bella Vado:

· Is Bella Vado avocado oil free from parabens?
· Is avocado oil healthy?
· How is avocado oil processed?
· Is Bella Vado avocado oil cold pressed?
· Who is Bella Vado California Avocado Oil?
· What are the health benefits of avocado oil?
· What is the shelf life of Bella Vado avocado oil?
· Is there butter flavored avocado oil?
· Does Bella Vado have avocado face scrubs?
· How is avocado oil extracted?
· Does avocado oil have a high temperature cooking point?
· Is Bella Vado avocado oil organic?

Disclaimer: The health benefits of avocado oil in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. Please call your doctor to receive medical advice.

ABOUT BELLA VADO CALIFORNIA AVOCADO OIL:
Bella Vado is a family owned business located on their 32 acre, Organic, chemical free grove and processing facility in southern California. Bella Vado Avocado Oil co-founder, Corinne da Silva says, when we look back, we realize how quickly it all flew by. Late night bottling parties calling in all of our kids and their friends who were well bribed with pizza and music. The stressful seventy two hour oil pressing runs where we rotated sleeping shifts. We did this while half of us worked full time jobs! We were dedicated. We hustled. We were heads down. We loved the art of the process of pressing our avocados into avocado oil. We spent time perfecting the process and looking to constantly improve our own oil each year. To us, Bella Vado is the heart of the avocado!

CERTIFICATIONS AND AWARDS:
Bella Vado avocado oil has been selected by the USDA to participate in setting CODEX standards world-wide for Extra Virgin Avocado Oil. It is our expertise and care that positioned the company for this valuable and honored position.

- Good Food Awards
- USDA Certified Organic
- Non GMO Certified
- San Diego Grown 365

• To learn more about Bella Vado California Avocado Oil: BellaVado.com
• Support Email: bellavado.com/pages/contact-us
